description: Working as a contractor in the banking and finance area.
Develop cloud solutions for the automation of the mortgage process.
Create IaaS with Terraform, code RESTful applications, and monitor the calls and errors of the endpoint with tools like DataDog and Kibana.
Sync-up with the team using Agile methodologies(Scrum, Kanban), and collaborate using Gitlab.
Delivery Owner for the Real Estate TCS personnel. I oversee the performance and compliance of 20 fellow developers.
